This quartz watch has decent craftsmanship & is made of stainless steel. The watch face is about 42mm and so, it may look a little bit big if you have a small wrist.The watch has 3 functioning subdials which show us either the day, date, or the time in 24hr format. The subdial at the 3 o'clock position shows the day of the week while the subdial at the 6 o'clock position shows the date of the month, and the subdial at the 9 o'clock position shows the current time in 24hr format. The day & date subdials change around 12am to 2:30am to show the next day & date. As I understand, it's best to not change the time during this period as it may affect the proper functioning of day & date subdials.The watch is 50m (5 BAR) water resistant, which means light swimming & showering with the watch is alright. Also, the straps are made of genuine leather.I personally loved the look of the watch along with my faith in the quality of products by the brand and so, I went for it. If this watch appeals to your taste, then go for it!
